title: Pure Boutique Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Portugese
description: This cafe has a coffee bar with soya milk option. Menu offers juices and smoothies, salads, sandwiches, and breakfast. Uses egg and dairy. Its terrace overlooks the golf course. Please confirm if there are vegan options and inform HappyCow. Also, please send a corrected map location if needed.
streetAddress: Quinta do Lago Real Estate Centre, Roundabout 2
